When we install [i:30f6piqz]Quest for Windows Desktop[/i:30f6piqz], it does not put an icon on our Desktop.  It doesn't even ask whether we would like an icon on our Desktop.  Most contemporary software does.

Instead, we must copy the icon from the Start folder (that [i:30f6piqz]Quest[/i:30f6piqz] does create) and paste it on the Desktop ourselves.

=====

Once again, as somebody responded in my previous "Enhancement" thread, "You do have to make an additional click or two".

It reminds me of the incredible shrinking wafer bar in the country where I live.  The wafer bar started at 50g.  Then, corporate management decided its first reduction should be to 48g.  Gullible consumers would say, "It's only a gram or two", but corporate management knew that those 2 grams add up.

[i:30f6piqz]Quest[/i:30f6piqz] is quite similar.  Extra clicks every time I want to select a base font.  Extra clicks every time I want to select a font color.  Extra clicks every time I want to select a background color.  And now, extra clicks when I want [i:30f6piqz]Quest[/i:30f6piqz]'s icon on my Desktop.

Those extra clicks add up.
Posts.HTML:
When we install Quest for Windows Desktop, it does not put an icon on our Desktop. It doesn't even ask whether we would like an icon on our Desktop. Most contemporary software does.

Instead, we must copy the icon from the Start folder (that Quest does create) and paste it on the Desktop ourselves.

=====

Once again, as somebody responded in my previous "Enhancement" thread, "You do have to make an additional click or two".

It reminds me of the incredible shrinking wafer bar in the country where I live. The wafer bar started at 50g. Then, corporate management decided its first reduction should be to 48g. Gullible consumers would say, "It's only a gram or two", but corporate management knew that those 2 grams add up.

Quest is quite similar. Extra clicks every time I want to select a base font. Extra clicks every time I want to select a font color. Extra clicks every time I want to select a background color. And now, extra clicks when I want Quest's icon on my Desktop.

Those extra clicks add up.
